name: voxel-dockerclient
description: An experimental minecraft-like docker client, built using voxel.js.

scripts.build-public: copyfiles --up 1 public/css/* public/fonts/* public/js/* public/textures/* public/*.html out && copyfiles -f node_modules/xterm/dist/xterm.js out/js && copyfiles -f node_modules/xterm/dist/xterm.css out/css
scripts.clean-public: rimraf out/css out/fonts out/js/*dialog.js out/js/xterm.js out/textures out/*.html
scripts.build-debug: npm run build-public && npm run build-client-debug && npm run build-server
scripts.build: npm run build-public && npm run build-client-release && npm run build-server
scripts.run-docker: npm run build-docker && docker container run --rm --mount type=bind,source=/var/run/docker.sock,target=/var/run/docker.sock --publish 8080:8080 ${npm_package_config_registry_user}/voxel-dockerclient:${npm_package_version}

author: Raj Chaudhuri
